comments: Brown (BOS) brings his off-arm toward Bridges (CHA) and marginal contact occurs as he releases away from the contact.
Brown (BOS) is bracing for the contact from Williams (CHA) and marginal contact occurs as he releases away from the contact.
Bridges (CHA) brings his hand towards Porzingis (BOS) and marginal contact occurs as he releases away to pursue the rebound.
Tatum (BOS) briefly grasps Hayward's (CHA) arm as they engage for off-ball position, and the contact is marginal.
Hayward (CHA) briefly grasps Tatum's (BOS) left arm and marginal contact occurs as Tatum receives the pass.
Bridges (CHA) legally contests Brown's (BOS) jump shot, making "high-five" contact after the ball is released.
Ball (CHA) clamps and holds Porzingis' (BOS) left arm, which affects his ability to pursue the rebound.
Bridges (CHA) brushes Tatum's (BOS) right shoulder and marginal contact occurs during Tatum's driving shot attempt.
Holiday (BOS) brushes Miller's (CHA) arm, causing Miller to momentarily lose control of the ball before he quickly regains possession.
Porzingis (BOS) brings his arms into a vertical position and cleanly blocks Williams' (CHA) shot near the rim.
Porzingis (BOS) is raising his arm into a vertical position and absorbs the marginal contact that occurs with Williams (CHA) during his shot attempt at the basket.
Ball (CHA) brings his arm toward Holiday's (BOS) path and marginal contact occurs during the drive, which Ball absorbs.
Ball (CHA) pulls Holiday's (BOS) right arm away from the ball, initiating contact that affects his driving shot attempt.
Ball (CHA) brings his hands towards Brown's (BOS) front and marginal contact occurs as he releases away to receive the pass.
Hayward (BOS) releases the in-bound pass within 5 seconds.
Porzingis (BOS) is the last player to touch the ball before the ball goes out of bounds.  Possession is correctly awarded to the Hornets.
Holiday (BOS) jumps alongside Ball's (CHA) path and marginal contact occurs with Ball's slightly extended knee.
Bridges (CHA) legally contests Hauser's (BOS) jump shot attempt.
Hayward (CHA) intentionally kicks the ball on the play.
Williams (CHA) and Pritchard (BOS) come together at the same spot and incidental foot to foot contact occurs during the drive.
Pritchard (BOS) lifts and re-plants his right pivot foot prior to releasing his jump shot attempt.
Williams (CHA) cleanly blocks Pritchard's (BOS) shot attempt.
Correctly called 24 second violation.
Tatum (BOS) rests a hand on Hayward's (CHA) front and immediately removes his hand as Hayward begins his upward shooting motion.
Williams (CHA) is already in Holiday's (BOS) path and he absorbs the contact to his upper body.
Bridges (CHA) legally contests Brown's (BOS) jump shot, making "high-five" contact after the ball is released.
Porzingis (BOS) avoids making contact with Williams (CHA) after he secures the rebound.
Holiday (BOS) inbounds the ball within five seconds.
Hayward (CHA) moves forward into Tatum's (BOS) lower body and initiates contact that affects his jump shot attempt.
Holiday (BOS) pulls Miller's (CHA) hand off of the ball and affects his ability to secure the rebound.

Holiday (BOS) commits a take foul on Bridges (CHA).  Although the foul is called with 3.2 seconds remaining on the game clock, the clock continues to run to 01.7 and it is not recognized by the officials.
Miller (CHA inbounds the ball within five seconds.
Hauser (BOS) commits a take foul on Hayward (CHA).
